Ipx.Name: snn_top_hls
Ipx.Description: An IP generated by Vitis HLS

fields.name: Enable
fields.description: Master enable for the device interrupt output to the system interrupt controller: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled

fields.name: CHAN0_INT_ST
fields.description: Channel 0 (ap_done) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 0 interrupt, 1 = Channel 0 interrupt.

fields.name: CHAN1_INT_ST
fields.description: Channel 1 (ap_ready) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 1 interrupt, 1 = Channel 1 interrupt.
